*[[Time Flute#Shops|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]] }} == Description == The '''Time Flute''' is a type of [[Flutes|Flute]]. By using Ground, Poison, and Steel Gems the Time Flute increases the player's Gym and Dungeon Timers. == Details == Time Flute increases the player's Gym and Dungeon Timers by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%. Costs a variable amount of Ground, Poison, and Steel Gems when active, cost based on how many total Flutes are active. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Fallarbor Town Gem Master|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]]| 5,000 [[File:Ground_Gem.png|30px]]
5,000 [[File:Poison_Gem.png|30px]]
5,000 [[File:Steel_Gem.png|30px]]}} |} |} __NOTOC__ {{Battle items}}
